staxel.village.character.dialogue.TomtiB: I'm so happy I moved here
There has never been a dull day here!
I get to see you, ^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop; and ^c:1486b0;Rosemary^c:pop; every day!
Oh... did I forgot to tell you...
^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop; has invited me over to his house!
That LAN party was a really good idea.
Me and ^c:1486b0;Jamie^c:pop; have been working on building a whole island from scratch!
You can't see it though ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... Not until it is finished!
I should play them a song on the ^c:1486b0;flute^c:pop; again sometime.
